akn:section.akn:heading: Governor, executive director, and alternates of Corporation

akn:content.akn:p: § 282a. Governor, executive director, and alternates of Corporation The governor and executive director of the International Bank for Reconstruction and Development, and the alternate for each of them, appointed under section 286a of this title, shall serve as governor, director and alternates, respectively, of the Corporation. (Aug. 11, 1955, ch. 788, § 3, 69 Stat. 669.)
